definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Impf. 1 s. [[אָהִָימָה]] Ps 55:3 shew disquietude (so most, cf. supr.); but Ol Che [[וְאֶהֱמָָוׇה]] ( Ps 77:4); Lag: Proph. Chald. xlviii. 2, BN 27 [[אֶהֱמֶה]] (v:Ps 55:18); 3 fpl. [[תְּהִימֶנׇה]] (?[[תֶּהֱמֶינׇה]]) Mic 2:12 they (i.e. fold & pasture) shall murmur with men.
